ygData.subject: Re: Flight Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, The flight spell which you speak of is a research only spell. It is the same as levitate except that only wizards can use it. I read this somewhere I
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,
The flight spell which you speak of is a research only spell. It is the same as levitate except that only wizards
can use it. I read this somewhere I will try to find where I read it if I can.
~~Farwen "Mightyraven" Ohtarin~~
--Ravenwalker--
High Elven Wizard of the 17 level (still). On Xegony...looking to trade languages with anyone. Name is Farwen.

Ulrich Vos wrote:

> From: "Ulrich Vos" <Ulrich.Vos@...>
>
> Hail,
> the levitate spell does not need to be researched. You can buy it at the
> spell vendors in Grobb.
> Greetings
> Rangar F`ire, Wizard of Neriak, Solusek Ro
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for a new hobby? Want to make a new friend?

> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research. Please keep the emails on topic.
